pageTitle: CRM Contracts, Contractor Rates for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Skills
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5661=The table below looks at the statistics for CRM skills in IT contracts advertised across the UK. textBeforeTable: The table below looks at the demand and provides a guide to the average contractor rates quoted in IT jobs citing CRM within the UK over the 3 months to 31 July 2015. The 'Rank Change' column provides an indication of the change in demand within each location based on the same 3 month period last year. CRM Top 30 Contract Locations This chart provides a histogram of hourly rates quoted in contract IT jobs citing CRM within the UK over the 3 months to 31 July 2015. CRM Hourly Rate Histogram This chart provides the 3-month moving average for hourly rates quoted in IT contractor jobs citing CRM within the UK. CRM Hourly Rate Trend This chart provides a histogram of daily rates quoted in contract IT jobs citing CRM within the UK over the 3 months to 31 July 2015. textAfterTable: CRM Top 30 Related IT Skills For the 6 months to 31 July 2015, IT contractor jobs within the UK citing CRM also mentioned the following IT skills in order of popularity. The figures indicate the number of jobs and their proportion against the total number of contract IT job ads sampled that cited CRM. 1 1391 (35.16%) Dynamics CRM 2 1110 (28.06%) Microsoft 3 787 (19.89%) SQL 4 747 (18.88%) Finance 5 650 (16.43%) Agile Software Development 6 620 (15.67%) .NET 7 502 (12.69%) MS Excel 8 482 (12.18%) SQL Server 9 474 (11.98%) C# 10 425 (10.74%) SAP 11 415 (10.49%) JavaScript 12 409 (10.34%) Oracle 13 405 (10.24%) Project Management
